allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add tenant infrastructure: TenantMixin, TenantManager, middleware

Critical multi-tenant foundation with automatic query scoping:
- TenantManager filters ALL queries by current tenant \(prevents data leaks\)
- TenantMiddleware resolves tenant from header/subdomain/default
- Tenant, TenantSettings, TenantSequence models
- Auto-create settings and sequences on tenant creation
- Default tenant "Raven Distribution" for development

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Party models: Party, Customer, Vendor, Location, Truck

Phase 1 party module implementation:
- Party: Universal entity for customers/vendors with tenant scoping
- Customer: Customer-specific attributes \(OneToOne with Party\)
- Vendor: Vendor-specific attributes \(OneToOne with Party\)
- Location: Physical addresses with type \(ship_to, bill_to, warehouse, office\)
- Truck: Scheduling resource for deliveries

All models inherit from TenantMixin for automatic query scoping.
Full admin interface with inline editing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh pr create --title "Add multi-week workbench scheduler \(SchedulerV2\)" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

- Implements **SchedulerV2** as a multi-week vertical scroll layout with a hybrid "workbench" data model
- Orders can be **loose** \(mockup/unassigned in a cell\) or **committed** \(inside an explicit delivery run container\)
- Each week renders as a self-contained 5-day band \(Mon-Fri\); users scroll vertically through 4 weeks
- Cross-week drag-and-drop updates `order.date` automatically
- Right-click date headers to lock/unlock capacity \(blocks inbound drops from other dates\)
- `[+ Add Run]` button on every cell to create new empty run containers
- Normalized Zustand store with reverse-lookup indices for O\(1\) membership queries
- 87 unit tests covering all store actions, locking rules, and index consistency

## Test plan

- [ ] `npx tsc --noEmit` passes with no type errors
- [ ] `npx vitest run src/components/scheduler-v2/` â€” 87 tests pass
- [ ] Navigate to `http://localhost:5173/scheduler-v2` and verify 4 week bands render
- [ ] Drag an order to a cell background â†’ becomes loose \(amber left border\)
- [ ] Drag a loose order onto a run container â†’ becomes committed
- [ ] Drag an order from Week 1 to Week 3 â†’ moves cross-week
- [ ] Right-click a date header â†’ locks column, blocks inbound drops
- [ ] Click `[+ Add Run]` â†’ creates empty run in cell

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
